description: Try our easy to follow Prawn Saganaki recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Prawn dishes,Christmas,Prawn,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Tomato,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Prawn Saganaki Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g cooked tiger prawns, peeled, tails intact

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tbs oil in a large ovenproof dish over medium heat. Add onion, chorizo, garlic and chilli, and cook for 3 minutes or until soft.
Add tomato, vinegar and sugar, and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes or until tomato has started to soften. Gently stir in prawns. Season with salt and pepper then sprinkle with feta.
Drizzle with remaining oil, transfer to oven, and grill for 5-8 minutes or until feta is golden. Sprinkle with parsley. Serve with lemon.
